name: Elf-World (Three Kingdoms)
detailed_description:
Bring you a new taste of the new three kindoms! There would be a massive forty Generals in it.
Through capturing of city after the attack, and develop it, would obtain a clue to get new generals.
Collect special weapons from special events.
co-ordinate the different generals , to defeat the powerful four Therions
More exciting, until you find out!

short_description: This is a RPG game of training multi heros , you could collect as many as forty generals to fight together , you would unlock more generals under attacking city and develop it ,Collect special weapons from special eventsã€‚co-ordinate the different generals to beat the boss .

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
